name: SCP-087-B: A New Descent
description:
You get sent for an exploration into a dark, brick stairwell. You only bring matches and a radio. But be careful, as there are horrors lurking below you....                                               

You will not leave this place..... Or maybe yes.......

Time will decide.

AestheticalGames discord server invite: https://discord.gg/Gw2gxqS

SCP-087-B was originally created by Undertow Games (Regalis) in 2012 as a small minigame, which became very popular. It used an ancient engine called BlitzMax with a Blitz3D SDK, which made the graphics look bad. This game also has some stuff from a mod called SCP-087-B Extended Edition.

Made with:

Unity 2018.3.8f1

Audacity

Blender

Visual Studio 2017

Paint. net
